We should try to avoid explicit wait commands like these, more info here
Here, you can verify that the alert component is no longer visible likecy.get('selector').should('not.be.visible');

I tried this approach where I replace cy.wait with the following, but it doesn't seem to work. Perhaps because alert component is modal and is only appearing for 5 seconds?
cy.get('alert').should('not.be.visible'); // wait for success alert component to disappear
Put comment above regarding alternative for cy.wait(6000);
Put comment above regarding alternative for cy.wait(6000);

is this for clean up or reset before the test starts?? If it's for cleanup, then it's better to delete in after() method, and just call the API to delete. To reset state in the begining, do them in before() method
Addressed, yes this is for clean up before the test!
